data.name: Kalinur
data.detailed_description:
DESCRIPTION

Kalinur is a mini metroidvania full of action and adventure. In it you will have to explore the entire castle in order to find and defeat a wizard named Kalinur, who used his power to leave the kingdom in a state of darkness and suffering. During this adventure you will have great challenges and rewards in order to bring peace back to the kingdom.

RESOURCES

- Great map to explore.
- 11 different areas.
- 31 different enemies.
- 9 Bosses.
- Upgrade your character

REASONS TO BUY

- The game is really fun.
- Help a small solo game developer.
- The price is VERY low.

HOW CAN I HELP MORE?

- Consider reviewing the game.
- Recommend to friends.

data.short_description: Defeat the mage Kalinur and bring peace back to the kingdom in this mini metroidvania with a lot of action.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD, AMD VEGA
  • Storage: 176 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
